titleStmt.title: An electronic transcription of Genizah Fragment Cambridge University TS F6.3
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.p: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution International 4.0 License.

note.p: Fragment in the Cambridge University Libraries, Taylor-Schechter Collection. Covers Bava Qamma 2:1 - 3:5; 10:9 - 10; Bava Metsi'a 1:1 - 2:5
Transcription from online images of the manuscript, available at http://jnul.huji.ac.il/dl/talmud/mishna/selmimnu.asp and at https://fgp.genizah.org. FGP nos. C166192-C166195
Supplied text based on Kaufmann ms, Library of the Hungarian Academy of Sciences, Kaufmann A50, except when preserved remains make such restoration unlikely.

handNote.note: Pointing is in a different ink than the main manuscript. Possibly a second hand.

revisionDesc.change: Shifted transcription to BM Ch 2, and revised tagging.
Updated tagging and header to reflect new schema
